attributes.action: Allow all Gurkha soldiers who have served our country faithfully the right to settle in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Gurkha is a volunteer soldier who works hard to get into the British Army.Many fail the selection. Once in the British army they go to any and all conflicts our soldiers are fighting in. They do so without complaint and fight in support of our own soldiers.Although the rules have changed to allow some Gurkhas the right to stay in the UK many who fall outside of the qualifying dates are being deported to face a life of poverty.These are men have served our country and should have earned the right to settle here.These are not immigrants looking for a free handout.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
